keys: Educación física. Juegos. Hoja de consejos
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ball Skills</string>
            <string language="es">Habilidades con la pelota</string>
            <string language="ga">Scileanna Liathróide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugel-Fähigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qualifications de Boule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habilidades Da Esfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abilità Della Sfera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεξιότητες σφαιρών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A holistic approach to gross motor skills in a social context.  Apart from the growth of confidence in the particular motor sklls, ball games are an easy way of becoming more integrated into the peer group. Skills in this area also bring a growth in self-esteem and the opportunity to become involved on teams and in inter-school events.</string>
            <string language="es">Una metodología general para las actividades motoras en un contexto social. Aparte del desarrollo de la confianza en las habilidades motoras particulares, los juegos de pelota son una forma fácil de integrarse más en un grupo de compañeros. Las habilidade</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur chuige iomlánaíoch do scileanna mótair i gcomhthéacs sóisialta. Chomh maith leis an bhfás i muinín sa scil mhótar áirithe, is bealach éasca iad cluichí liathróide le bheith níos imeasctha i bpiarghrúpa. Tugann scileanna sa réimse seo fás san fhéinmhui</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Juegos. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Games</string>
            <string language="ga">Cluichí</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine holistic Annäherung, zum von von 
Bewegungsfähigkeiten in einem Sozialkontext zu verdienen. 
Abgesehen von dem Wachstum des Vertrauens in den bestimmten 
Motorsklls, sind Kugelspiele eine einfache Methode des Werdens mehr 
integriert in die Gleichgruppe. Fähigkeiten in diesem Bereich 
holen auch ein Wachstum im Self-esteem und die Gelegenheit, auf Teams 
beteiligt zu werden und in den Zwischen-Schule Fällen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une approche holistique pour agréger les 
habiletés motrices dans un contexte social. Indépendamment de 
la croissance de la confiance en sklls particuliers de moteur, les 
jeux de boule sont une voie facile de devenir davantage intégrée 
dans le groupe de pair. Les qualifications dans cette zone 
apportent également une croissance de art de l'auto-portrait-esteem et l'occasion 
de devenir impliquées sur des équipes et des événements 
d'inter-école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma aproximação holística para gross 
habilidades de motor em um contexto social. Aparte do 
crescimento da confiança nos sklls particulares do motor, os jogos da
esfera são uma maneira fácil de tornar-se integrada mais no grupo do
par. As habilidades nesta área trazem também um crescimento no
self-esteem e a oportunidade tornar-se involvidas em equipes e em 
eventos da inter-escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un metodo holistic per gross le abilità motorie 
in un contesto sociale. Oltre allo sviluppo di riservatezza 
negli sklls particolari del motore, i giochi della sfera sono un modo 
facile di diventare di più integrato nel gruppo del pari. Le 
abilità in questa zona egualmente portano uno sviluppo nel 
self-esteem e l'occasione essere implicate sulle squadre e negli 
eventi della inter-scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ολιστική προσέγγιση στις ακαθάριστες δεξιότητες 
μηχανών σε ένα κοινωνικό πλαίσιο. Εκτός από την αύξηση 
της εμπιστοσύνης στην ιδιαίτερη μηχανή sklls, τα παιχνίδια 
σφαιρών είναι ένας εύκολος τρόπος που ενσωματώνεται περισσότερο
στην όμοια ομάδα. Οι δεξιότητες σε αυτήν την περιοχή 
φέρνουν επίσης μια αύξηση του αυτοσεβασμού και της ευκαιρίας να 
αναμιχθούν στις ομάδες και των διασχολικών γεγονότων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
